description.zh-cn: 香港数学家，前任香港行政长官林郑月娥的配偶。
description.en: A Hong Kong mathematician and the spouse of Carrie Lam, the former Chief Executive of Hong Kong.

description.zh-cn: 香港政治人物，曾任香港特别行政区行政长官。
description.en: A Hong Kong politician who served as the Chief Executive of the Hong Kong Special Administrative Region.

description.zh-cn: 林兆波与林郑月娥的长子。
description.en: The elder son of Lam Siu-por and Carrie Lam.

description.zh-cn: 林兆波与林郑月娥的次子。
description.en: The younger son of Lam Siu-por and Carrie Lam.

description.zh-cn: 位于香港的一所中学。
description.en: A secondary school located in Hong Kong.

description.zh-cn: 位于香港的一所公立研究型大学。
description.en: A public research university in Hong Kong.

description.zh-cn: 位于英国剑桥的研究型大学。
description.en: A research university in Cambridge, United Kingdom.

description.zh-cn: 英国数学家，代数拓扑领域的专家，曾任教于剑桥大学。
description.en: A British mathematician, an expert in the field of algebraic topology, who taught at the University of Cambridge.

description.zh-cn: 位于香港的一所公立研究型大学。
description.en: A public research university in Hong Kong.

description.zh-cn: 位于中国北京的一所师范大学。
description.en: A normal university in Beijing, China.

en: Spouse of the Chief Executive of Hong Kong

description.zh-cn: 香港特别行政区行政长官配偶的官方身份。
description.en: The official title for the spouse of the Chief Executive of Hong Kong.

description.zh-cn: 香港前任行政长官梁振英的夫人，林兆波的前任者。
description.en: Spouse of former Hong Kong Chief Executive Leung Chun-ying, and Lam Siu-por's predecessor.

description.zh-cn: 香港现任行政长官李家超的夫人，林兆波的继任者。
description.en: Spouse of current Hong Kong Chief Executive John Lee Ka-chiu, and Lam Siu-por's successor.

description.zh-cn: 1841年至1997年间由英国管治的香港。
description.en: Hong Kong under British rule from 1841 to 1997.

description.zh-cn: 英属香港时期的香港政府。
description.en: The government of Hong Kong during the British colonial period.

nodes.id: 香港特别行政区行政长官

zh-cn: 香港特别行政区行政长官

description.zh-cn: 香港特别行政区的政府首长职位。
description.en: The position of the head of government of the Hong Kong Special Administrative Region.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国解决香港、澳门问题及实现国家统一而提出的基本国策。
description.en: The basic state policy proposed by the People's Republic of China to resolve the issues of Hong Kong and Macau and to achieve national reunification.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物，曾任中华人民共和国国务院总理。
description.en: A Chinese politician who served as the Premier of the State Council of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 2019年至2020年在香港发生的大规模社会运动。
description.en: A large-scale social movement that took place in Hong Kong from 2019 to 2020.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党中央委员会总书记，中华人民共和国最高领导人。
description.en: The General Secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China and the paramount leader of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的爱国歌曲。
description.en: A patriotic song of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 林兆波与林郑月娥于1984年在香港结婚。
description.en: Lam Siu-por and Carrie Lam married in Hong Kong in 1984.

description.zh-cn: 林节思是林兆波的长子。
description.en: Lam Chit-sze is the elder son of Lam Siu-por.

description.zh-cn: 林约希是林兆波的儿子。
description.en: Lam Yeuk-hei is the son of Lam Siu-por.

description.zh-cn: 林节思是林郑月娥的长子。
description.en: Lam Chit-sze is the elder son of Carrie Lam.

description.zh-cn: 林约希是林郑月娥的儿子。
description.en: Lam Yeuk-hei is the son of Carrie Lam.

description.zh-cn: 林兆波出生于英属香港。
description.en: Lam Siu-por was born in British Hong Kong.

description.zh-cn: 1971年在玛利诺神父教会学校中五毕业。
description.en: Graduated from Form 5 at Maryknoll Fathers' School in 1971.

description.zh-cn: 林兆波在剑桥大学攻读博士学位时，师从弗兰克·亚当斯。
description.en: While pursuing his PhD at the University of Cambridge, Lam Siu-por was supervised by Frank Adams.

description.zh-cn: 林兆波曾在北京首都师范大学教授短期数学课程。
description.en: Lam Siu-por taught short-term mathematics courses at Capital Normal University in Beijing.

description.zh-cn: 港英政府曾推荐林郑月娥前往剑桥大学进行短期进修。
description.en: The Hong Kong British Government recommended Carrie Lam for a short-term study program at the University of Cambridge.

relationships.target: 香港特别行政区行政长官

description.zh-cn: 在2017年情人节公开的情书中，林兆波鼓励妻子林郑月娥为落实“一国两制”作出贡献。
description.en: In a love letter made public on Valentine's Day 2017, Lam Siu-por encouraged his wife, Carrie Lam, to contribute to the implementation of 'One country, two systems'.

description.zh-cn: 时任中国国务院总理李克强签署国务院令，任命林郑月娥为香港第五任行政长官。
description.en: Then-Premier of the State Council of China, Li Keqiang, signed a State Council decree appointing Carrie Lam as the fifth Chief Executive of Hong Kong.

description.zh-cn: 林郑月娥在北京接受任命状时，林兆波陪同出席并与李克强握手合照。
description.en: When Carrie Lam received her letter of appointment in Beijing, Lam Siu-por accompanied her and had a handshake and photo with Li Keqiang.

description.zh-cn: 反修例运动期间，林兆波曾称其妻林郑月娥为“历史罪人”，表达了对其处理方式的反对。
description.en: During the Anti-Extradition Law Amendment Bill Movement, Lam Siu-por reportedly called his wife, Carrie Lam, a 'sinner of history', expressing opposition to her handling of the situation.

description.zh-cn: 在澳门回归20周年晚会上，习近平带领全场拍手同唱《歌唱祖国》。
description.en: At the gala for the 20th anniversary of Macau's return, Xi Jinping led the audience in clapping and singing 'Ode to the Motherland'.

description.zh-cn: 在澳门回归20周年晚会上，林兆波在全场同唱《歌唱祖国》时没有拍掌或歌唱。
description.en: At the gala for the 20th anniversary of Macau's return, Lam Siu-por did not clap or sing along while the audience sang 'Ode to the Motherland'.
